info.title: Data Grid List
info.description: The Data Grid List can be used to present multiple data in the form of a grid.

prop.name: checkable
prop.description: If set to TRUE a checkbox will be prepended in each row

prop.name: checkList
prop.description: A list of the row checkboxes

prop.name: columnRatios
prop.description: Requested width ratios for the columns

method.name: __construct
method.description: The constructor class. Use this to create a dataGridList object.

parameter.name: $id
parameter.description: The id of the data grid list element.

parameter.name: $checkable
parameter.description: If set to TRUE, the dataGridList will have a checkbox at the start of each row. It is FALSE by default.

parameter.name: $withBorder
parameter.description: Defines whether the gridList will have visual border. It is TRUE by default.

method.name: setColumnRatios
method.description: Sets the ratios of the columns widths.

parameter.name: $ratios
parameter.description: The columns width ratios. Must contain numeric values between 0 and 1 (excluding) or else the requested ratios will be ignored.

parameter.name: $headers
parameter.description: An array with the header contents (can be text or DOMElement)

method.name: insertRow
method.description: Creates a grid row with the specified contents. If no arguments are passed, the returned value is FALSE. If more than three arguments are passed, those are ignored.

parameter.name: $checkName
parameter.description: The name of the row's checkbox (This is ignored if list is not checkable).

parameter.name: $checked
parameter.description: If list is checkable initializes the row's checkbox in $checked state

parameter.name: $checkValue
parameter.description: The value of the row's checkbox (This is ignored if list is not checkable). It is empty by default.

method.name: insertSimpleRow
method.description: Assistant function in inserting a row into the dataGridList

parameter.name: $class
parameter.description: Extra classes for styling specific rows (used for header)

method.name: insertCheckRow
method.description: Assistant function in prepending a checkbox in a row.

parameter.name: $checkValue
parameter.description: The value of the row's checkbox (This is ignored if list is not checkable). It is empty by default.
